param.name: eventId
param.span: 方法要處理的事件識別項。

span.span: The identifier for the event the method will handle.

param.name: element

span.span: The method to call when the specified event occurs.
Registers a method that handles [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 部分類別，例如、 公開欄位識別特定類別的事件。Some classes, such as , expose fields identifying events that are specific to the class. 方法提供一種機制，可讓您註冊這些事件處理常式。The method provides a mechanism that enables you to register handlers for these events. `eventHandler` 可以是方法或參考，這個方法的執行個體 (`AddressOf` Visual Basic 中)。`eventHandler` can be an instance of the method, or a reference to the method (`AddressOf` in Visual Basic).
